definitions.definition: Lacking awareness ; unmindful ; unaware , unconscious of.
examples: Your grandmother is completely oblivious to her surroundings.
He's hopelessly oblivious , always forgetting his appointments.
definitions.label_groups: dated , usually with of , never with to

main_definition: ( usually with to or of ) Lacking awareness ; unmindful ; unaware , unconscious of.
secondary_definitions: ( dated , usually with of , never with to ) Forgetful .
